name: Achievement Lurker: Dad Jokes
description:
Join Jordy, the #1 Dad on his quest to be the best dad in the land. Jordy the #1 Dad roams the vast landscape and meets interesting friends like Mihailovich &
Sergej. Jordy the #1 Dad is fueled by pride and arousal, in his quest to learn all the Dad jokes in the world. Do you have what it takes to become the #1 Dad? This RPG style adventure game includes turn based combat as well as boss fights. There is also an XP system in the game that allows you to level up your daditude level. As you progress through the game you must find all the NPC's in order to learn their Dad Jokes. Its your classic RPG adventure mixed with comedy.


  • Multiple map areas
  • Turn Based Combat
  • XP system
  • Boss fights
  • Comedy
  • 5000 Steam Achievements
